capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been getting to know Dudley and from what I can gather, he's got a pretty unconventional personality. He's all about breaking the rules and doing things his own way. That's definitely not for everyone, but it seems to suit him just fine.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been talking to Dudley and from what I can gather, he's a guy. I'm pretty sure of it, so that's confirmed in my mind.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I have to say, he can be a bit... self-centered. He has this personality that's really focused on himself, which is why people might describe him as selfish.
